import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; import Link from 'next/link'; import { addQuantityWithNumber } from '../../store/actions/actions'; import SizeGuide from './SizeGuide'; import Shipping from './Shipping'; class ProductContent extends Component { state = { qty: 1, max: 10, min: 1, sizeGuide: false, shipModal: false }; handleAddToCartFromView = () => { this.props.addQuantityWithNumber(this.props.product.id, this.state.qty); toast.success('Added to the cart', { position: "bottom-left", autoClose: 5000, hideProgressBar: false, closeOnClick: true, pauseOnHover: true, draggable: true }); } IncrementItem = () => { this.setState(prevState => { if(prevState.qty < 10) { return { qty: prevState.qty + 1 } } else { return null; } }); } DecreaseItem = () => { this.setState(prevState => { if(prevState.qty > 1) { return { qty: prevState.qty - 1 } } else { return null; } }); } openSizeGuide = () => { this.setState({ sizeGuide: true }); } closeSizeGuide = () => { this.setState({ sizeGuide: false }); } openShipModal = () => { this.setState({ shipModal: true }); } closeShipModal = () => { this.setState({ shipModal: false }); } render() { const { sizeGuide, shipModal } = this.state; return (
